data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (cpu_usage IS NULL OR cpu_usage < 85) AND (failed_connections IS NULL OR failed_connections < 1) AND (io_consumption IS NULL OR io_consumption < 85) AND (memory_usage IS NULL OR memory_usage < 85) AND (storage_usage IS NULL OR storage_usage < 85)) AS 'Health Score' FROM microsoft_azure_databases_postgresql_server FACET microsoft_azure_databases_postgresql_server_name
SELECT uniqueCount(microsoft_azure_databases_postgresql_server_name) AS 'PostgreSQL Servers' FROM microsoft_azure_databases_postgresql_server FACET location

presentation.title: Location Distribution
presentation.notes: The resource location the server resides in

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(microsoft_azure_databases_postgresql_server_name) AS 'PostgreSQL Servers' FROM microsoft_azure_databases_postgresql_server FACET resource_group

presentation.title: Resource Group Distribution
presentation.notes: The Resource Group of the Azure resource.

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(microsoft_azure_databases_postgresql_server_name) AS 'PostgreSQL Servers' FROM microsoft_azure_databases_postgresql_server FACET sku_tier

presentation.title: SKU Tier Distribution
presentation.notes: The tier of the particular SKU

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(microsoft_azure_databases_postgresql_server_name) AS 'PostgreSQL Servers' FROM microsoft_azure_databases_postgresql_server FACET version
SELECT average(cpu_usage) FROM microsoft_azure_databases_postgresql_server COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(memory_usage) FROM microsoft_azure_databases_postgresql_server COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT sum(active_connections) FROM microsoft_azure_databases_postgresql_server COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT sum(failed_connections) FROM microsoft_azure_databases_postgresql_server COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(storage_usage) FROM microsoft_azure_databases_postgresql_server COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(io_consumption) FROM microsoft_azure_databases_postgresql_server COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
